mutants.original_line: """ Sorts emails based on total character count and then by count of unique characters in the local part """
mutants.code:
import re

def sort_emails(emails):
    """"""
    regex = '\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\\b'
    valid_emails = [email for email in emails if re.match(regex, email)]
    valid_emails.sort(key=lambda x: (len(x), len(set(x.split('@')[0]))))
    return valid_emails

import re

def sort_emails(emails):
    """ Sorts emails based on total character count and then by count of unique characters in the local part """
    regex = ''
    valid_emails = [email for email in emails if re.match(regex, email)]
    valid_emails.sort(key=lambda x: (len(x), len(set(x.split('@')[0]))))
    return valid_emails

import re

def sort_emails(emails):
    """ Sorts emails based on total character count and then by count of unique characters in the local part """
    regex = '\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\\b'
    valid_emails = [email for email in emails if re.match(regex, email)]
    valid_emails.sort(key=lambda x: (len(x), len(set(x.split('')[0]))))
    return valid_emails
